remarks: Construct a 3-dimensional volume (height-4 element) on top of a given atom ` P ` .  (Contributed by NM, 25-Jul-2012.)
statement:
3dim0.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
3dim0.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
3dim0.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
3dim1 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ P e. A ) -> E. q e. A E. r e. A E. s e. A ( P =/= q /\ -. r .<_ ( P .\/ q ) /\ -. s .<_ ( ( P .\/ q ) .\/ r ) ) ) $.
$d .<_ q r s $.
$d .\/ q r s $.
$d A q r s $.
$d A q r s $.
$d P q r s $.
